column1:
Watch this animation (http://openstaxcollege.org/l/braindevel) to examine the development of the brain, starting
with the neural tube. As the anterior end of the neural tube develops, it enlarges into the primary vesicles that
establishtheforebrain,midbrain,andhindbrain.Thosestructurescontinuetodevelopthroughouttherestofembryonic
developmentandintoadolescence.Theyarethebasisofthestructureofthefullydevelopedadultbrain.Howwould
you describe the difference in the relative sizes of the three regions of the brain when comparing the early (25th
embryonic day) brain and the adult brain?
